dict.string:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
''' dp workflow
Author: Jeffssss
''' import sys import webbrowser
originStr = u'{query}' url = '' #获取key对应的结果 result = originStr if(result.lower().startswith('http')): url = result; else: url = 'http://'+result; sys.path.append("libs") webbrowser.open(url)

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
''' dp workflow
Author: Jeffssss
''' import ConfigParser
cf = ConfigParser.ConfigParser() cf.read("data.conf") section = "mapping"
originStr = u'{query}' #originStr = 'hy'
resultStr = '' #获取类似的结果 entries = cf.items(section) for (key, value) in entries : if(key.lower().startswith(originStr) and key != originStr): resultStr = resultStr + '<item uid="dpflow" arg="' + value + '"><title>' + key + '</title><subtitle>' + value + '</subtitle><icon>icon.png</icon></item>' #获取key对应的结果 try: result = cf.get(section,originStr) resultStr = resultStr + '<item uid="dpflow" arg="' + result + '" valid="yes"><title>' + originStr + '</title><subtitle>' + result + '</subtitle><icon>icon.png</icon></item>' except Exception, e: pass #判断是否无结果 if(resultStr == '' ): resultStr = '<item uid="dpflow" arg="null"><title>no result</title><subtitle>无结果</subtitle><icon>icon.png</icon></item>'
resultStr = '<?xml version="1.0"?><items>' + resultStr + '</items>' print resultStr
